sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Student
Admission to a State university.
sections.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law to the contrary, a State university shall admit and grant junior status in a program, subject to available program capacity, to any Illinois community college student who:

sections.heading: Board of Higher Education reviews and reports.
sections.text: Board of Higher Education reviews and reports.

sections.heading: Implementation of Act; intent.  It is the intent of the General Assembly that the requirements placed on community college districts pursuant to this Act be carried out in the normal course of program development and approval, course scheduling, and degree issuance and do not represent any new activ
sections.text: Implementation of Act; intent. It is the intent of the General Assembly that the requirements placed on community college districts pursuant to this Act be carried out in the normal course of program development and approval, course scheduling, and degree issuance and do not represent any new activities or a higher level of service on the part of community college districts.
